Package com.group25.game

Class EnemySpawner

java.lang.Object
com.group25.game.GameEntity
com.group25.game.EnemySpawner
public class EnemySpawner
extends GameEntity
Creating a spawner (point) where monsters will re-appear ones killed or some threshold is crossed

    • EnemySpawner

      public EnemySpawner​(float positionX, float positionY, int width, int height, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite img, EnemyFactory factory, int spawnTime)
      Parameters:
      positionX - - x position of where the spanwer appears
      positionY - - y position of where the spawner appears
      width - - width of the spanwer
      height - - height of the spawner
      img - - display image which will display the spawner
      factory - - Factory which will be responsible for creating the appointed enemies
      spawnTime - - Frames taken to create a new monster

    • spawnNewMonster

      public void spawnNewMonster​(Level level, java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies, int positionX, int positionY, int width, int height, int health, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite img, float speed)
      Function which over a certain amount of frames will create a new monster and add it to the level currently running
      Parameters:
      enemies - - list of enemies to which we want to add the monster
      positionX - - position X where the monster will spawn
      positionY - - position Y where the monster will spawn
      width - - Width of the monster
      height - - height of the monster
      health - - health of the monster
      img - - image of how the monster will look like
      speed - - how quickly the monster travels
